history.proof: intros step init n. induction n. - simpl. intros a Ha. exists 0. apply Ha. - hauto l: on depth: 3.

tactic: destruct IHn with (a := a) as [m Hm].
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable a (possible name is: x).

original: intros step init n. induction n. - simpl. intros a Ha. exists 0. apply Ha. - simpl. intros a Ha. destruct IHn with (a := a) as [m Hm]. apply Ha. exists (S m). apply Hm.
